choose-dic: For learning foreign language choose dictionary
open-txt: Or select your own .txt file. Separate there translation by an equal sign ( = )
assemble-parts: Assemble the translation from the parts below
all-matched: Congratulations! You've matched all. Delete the familiar and click Next
all-learned: Now your dictionary is empty. Select a dictionary to study.
tips-text: Don't be afraid to make mistakes. The result depends on how quickly and regularly you repeat it over and over again. It is not the strongest, the smartest, or the most talented who wins, but the one who never gives up.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure the best user experience. Please review our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

select-spot-first: First, select where you want to place it.
